comment:
He is my favorite so far at KSU.
Very fun and engaging lectures. 
He makes the expectations crystal clear. 
Gives tons of real world applications related with Operations.

Professor Dag, like others have said, is exceptional. Great professor. Each week/module is well organized and he lays out expectations for assignments clearly, with an introduction video each week and Excel application videos which make the completion of assignments very straightforward. Wouldn't hesitate to take any of his course offerings!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Dag was the best professor I've had at Kennesaw. He is very caring, fun, and very focused on making sure everyone was learning and understanding the content. Attendance is mandatory, but it is worth it!

Take him for Operations Management. A few hours of work a week, with one Excel assignment, a quick Smartbook assignment, and a Connect quiz. He has videos to teach you everything and walks you through the Excel assignment. Two lockdown tests with a similar study guide and an easy group project that takes two hours.
